hiveArticle.title: ColorChallenge - Thursday Green - Trees in Rain
hiveArticle.body:
Yesterday it was raining in bangalore at the evening time. There were clouds all around but the sun was still visible. I tried to capture the sky keeping the focus on the trees so that rain will be visible. 

I would love to know the feedback about the photo, how I would have improved it.

<hr>

##### Trees In Rain during Sunset

<hr>

 ![image](https://img.esteem.ws/9kbyq5jtey.jpg)

After some editing 

 ![image](https://img.esteem.ws/xthv42a1nl.jpg)

<hr>

##### Camera : Nokia 6

<hr>

##### Follow @codingdefined
